        Displays a dialog saying the file exists and requests user choice on whether to replace
        Parameters:
        newFile - The file attempting to be written to

      • finish

        public void finish()
        Overrides the finish function to ensure that the changes in edit text have been saved

      • initButtons

        private void initButtons()
        Used to help the initial setup of the UI. It adds listeners to all of the buttons in the text field bar
